website_summaries.verdict: For a budget price, you get a great helmet for beginners.
pros: material inside helmet eliminates moisture quickly
cons: You'll probably want to purchase extra accessories after, such as a chin curtain

customer_reviews.title: This helmet saved my life!
customer_reviews.text: A "non alert" driver pulled out in front of me and I T-Boned her, flying up over the car smashing my head on the car, knocking me out on the way over. I was very lucky to walk away with some serious road rash down my body, a banged up shoulder and a concussion. Everyone please pay attention when driving and always look twice for motorcycles. She could have killed me that day...
customer_reviews.author: @itsbando

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet for the price! I use to race motorcycles and cars so I've owned many helmet, some in the thousand dollar range, so I know a decent helmet when I put one on my head. This helmet, the HJC Solid Mens CL-17 Full Face Motorcycle helmet is a great value and good quality helmet. It has great ventilation and inner liners are very comfortable. I couldn't be happier about my purchase of this motorcycle helmet. Note: Don't buy the replacement lens HJC HJ-09 Shield Silver with the mirror finish, it's a piece of crap! See my review of the face shield for more details. Helmet GOOD, replacement face shield BAD!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Bargain compared to Arai
customer_reviews.text: Pros: weight, price, noise, peripheral vision Cons: sized small I usually wear a L but after reading the fine print on sizing and reviews I ordered the XL. It was snug but fit well. I had always owned Arai Signet or Shoei helmets but the $600 made me dizzy. I feel that I did not compromise my comfort or safety with this helmet. Of course, only time will tell how well it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: David Oleynik

customer_reviews.title: Quality....
customer_reviews.text: Excellent........ Some say buy a size bigger?....... A new helmet should fit snug...... It will break in. Yes, it may be a little uncomfortable getting the right size, but it will break in..... Go with your regular size.......!
customer_reviews.author: RegisS

customer_reviews.title: Has multiple vents built in and shield is easy to flip up as needed
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Purchased for autocross event. Has multiple vents built in and shield is easy to flip up as needed. Used chart to order size and found that large was recommended. Helmet is a bit snug, but not uncomfortable and will likely fit better with some more use.
customer_reviews.author: Shomare

customer_reviews.title: Good, Solid Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. If in doubt about size, go with the LARGER SIZE. I needed a XXXL, and the fit is perfectly snug. Only complaint is that it's a bit noisy, even with the vents closed. For the money it's an awesome helmet. Got one for me and one apiece for my 2 sons.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've always worn a medium HJC in dirt bike helmets their street helmets are the same perfect fit. Also like that it is quieter than the cheap no name helmets.
customer_reviews.author: Motoxroc

customer_reviews.title: NIce helmet. Good air. Great color.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice helmet. I found the airflow to be stellar. The built in chin curtain is very nice. In the end, however, we found the Sena headset to work better with the CL-MAXBT II so we returned this in exchange for that one.
customer_reviews.author: Brad McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Good Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Good helmet. No real complaints, but it is a little heavier on my head than my Bell helmet, and the visor doesn't flip up very easy, which means my visor fogs at signals sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: HJC is always a good choice
customer_reviews.text: Fit and finish appear to be very good. I own several HJC helmets and all are good quality. For the price and the fact it is M2010 rated are my reason for purchase. I will update as the racing season gets underway and the helmet see more action.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great lid for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ride a HD Sportster without a windshield and my usual 1/2 helmet was going to work, so I was recommended this lid. Fits great, not the lightest, but certainly not uncomfortable. Taking a little bit of getting used too, coming from a 1/2 lid kind of riding.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson

customer_reviews.title: Good and Solide.
customer_reviews.text: Good. Kind of snug, but I am sure it will get broken in soon. I've had my old one for about ten years. Decided to get a new one. This one fits, it is not as noisy. I don't have any complaints as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: L. Clopton

customer_reviews.title: great helmet
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and I think it is very good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Wine

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, last on was stolen off my bike.glad it wasn't a expensive helmet
customer_reviews.author: kit Freeman

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: great product!, I've been using this helmet for the past 4 months with no issues, I hope to never test the protection, but it feels very comfortable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: JoeD

customer_reviews.title: Feels amazing. I got a large when I normally wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Feels amazing. I got a large when I normally wear medium but it fits nicely. Only down side is this helmet makes my head look huge (snell certified) compared to my body. Really like this helmet
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable helmet and many breathing points for natural air flow ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable helmet and many breathing points for natural air flow to come in. I put the tinted visor on it and it made the helmet look more aggressive than it already was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I need. I only wish it was a little smaller. It is still in great shape since August 2015! The only thing is it can get scratch easily.
customer_reviews.author: Thinh

customer_reviews.title: Buy this beauty, but go one size up
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. It doesn't have a lot of features, but it's really good looking, well made and looks like you can trust in it. I bought 2, S and M, and they run a little small, so, if you are going to buy, go one size up after measure your head using the provided chart.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great
customer_reviews.text: I got this helmet for autocross as it meets snell and DOT specifications, I have not used it at an event yet but plan to soon, it is a well built helmet and the matte black color looks great
customer_reviews.author: Rollin218

customer_reviews.title: Big outside, small indide.
customer_reviews.text: Always wear a medium helmet. Ordered a large by mistake. Fits good, but a bit tight when new.
customer_reviews.author: rick o shea

customer_reviews.title: The helmet has good peripheral visibility and is not too noisy
customer_reviews.text: This helmet is true to size. I wear a 7 1/2"- 7/58" hat, thus I opted for the large. The fit is very true the helmet is snug on me, just as I expected. The helmet has good peripheral visibility and is not too noisy. If you are looking for a helmet in the $100-$150 price range, this HJC is most likely the best at that price.
customer_reviews.author: T. P.

customer_reviews.title: looks great, just as expected
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, looks great, just as expected. Sizing chart helped.
customer_reviews.author: KansasJoe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome helmet though
customer_reviews.text: If you're a large order a Xlarge. Their sizing is off. Awesome helmet though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Everything was exactly as described, arrives in a cloth bag for storage. Ordered a Large and it fits snug, but not too tight
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet. Fits exactly as expected based off HJC's ...
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. Fits exactly as expected based off HJC's sizing chart. Excellent airflow. All around good helmet at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: The helmet was great!! With the padding the helmet was somewhat ...
customer_reviews.text: The helmet was great!! With the padding the helmet was somewhat smaller than I expected. I had to return it but am getting a larger size. Update: I have the new helmet and it's great! Fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Brother LoveS It. He Use This One Then Is Other One.
customer_reviews.author: laury

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great breathing, no fog! Solid helmet, make sure you measure your head before you order!
customer_reviews.author: Fadi Maksad

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat it, they do run a tad big though. I wore a large Scorpion and I measured right on the boarder for medium and large as per HJC's site and went with large. It fits but it is definitely bigger than the Scorpion large, but I feel like a medium would have been too snug to be comfortable. Nice and light and decently quiet riding.
customer_reviews.author: AZee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping and an excellent product. The helmet is so nice: love it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Tawee

customer_reviews.title: Great  Helmet
customer_reviews.text: This is only the second helmet I've owned so i only have one to compare to. That being said i feel the helmet is very well built. The air vents seem to allow more air in than my previous helmet. The chin strap is comfortable. The only negative thing i have noticed is that the wind noise seems a little louder than my previous helmet. The price was great for a DOT & SNELL approved helmet. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tony P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money - No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: So far a great helmet. Love the look and seems to do the job without breaking the bank. This helmet is comfortable and I would purchase it again if/when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic helmet!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely five stars. This helmet is fantastic! Like I said about the Viking mesh jacket " get hot easy". I will start sweating like a mad man doing anything when it is over 76°. The vents on this helmet really work great, even with shield closed! It really feels and looks great too! I would definitely recommend. Also on a related note, I signed up for a free month of prime and I have been saving a ton on fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: The helmet looks really big and bulky but it's comfortable and the visor swapping is super simple and quick
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery! The helmet looks really big and bulky but it's comfortable and the visor swapping is super simple and quick
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great airflow broke in just a couple days ago after about 200 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Ro Ma

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used this helmet yet but the price was perfect and the shipping was prior prompt as promised
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this helmet yet but the price was perfect and the shipping was prior prompt as promised. It's a little bigger than my cs-r2 but other than that I'm happily satisfied...
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First helmet ive had and fits good. Good airflow too
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits well looks really good in person can't wait to wear it on my street bike.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan DuBois

customer_reviews.title: Fog and irritation free.
customer_reviews.text: Bought and used for safety course. Worn for 4 hours in the rain on day one and 4 hours in 90 degree heat the second day. No irritation or hot spots from rubbing, though the shape of your head can change that. Easy to operate vents and sheild with gloves. Sheild never fogged over.
customer_reviews.author: Redbaron

customer_reviews.title: overall very comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: Aftermarket chin curtain is a must, overall very comfortable... a little heavier than my last helmet but very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Looks cooler than the CL16, but pads much more snug.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using CL16 helmets for years, and love them. Seeing a new model I jumped right on it (since the price was comparable and the CL17 looks significantly cooler). Pros: - I like the forehead vents of the CL17 better than the CL16. They're larger, and easier to work with gloves while riding. Cons: - The pads are much thicker than the CL16 of the same size (large) so my face felt like it was going to pop for a few weeks. NC-700X Riders: The CL17 is just slightly too big for the NC-700X's front cargo case (but the CL16 fits perfectly)... but this is no fault of the helmet... just an unfortunate coincidence.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F.

customer_reviews.title: I'm a medium in full face helmets, even other ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a medium in full face helmets, even other HJC models. But I had to return this helmet as it was too small for my head.
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet. Matte black version looks great with almost ...
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. Matte black version looks great with almost any visor, though it needs cleaning more frequently than other colors because fingermarks get on fairly easily on the matte black. Nothing beats good old warm water and dish soap then air dry. Dot and snell approved. Blocks noise very well. Has 3 venting systems (2 side vents on top, 1 vent on forehead, and one on chin / mouth) Please get this helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Tai

customer_reviews.title: Good helmet so far. Snell M2015 certified label inside.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Good price for a Snell rated helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Rjgogo

product_meta.title: HJC Solid Men's CL-17 Full Face Motorcycle Helmet - Matte Black/Small
product_meta.description: Size:SmallThe HJC CL-17 Helmet hits the same ratings as the big boys yet comes in at hundreds less. This is a helmet designed to keep you cool. Advanced ventilation channels do most of the work but a moisture wicking interior liner is there for backup. Out of the box this helmet comes with a Pinlock-ready face shield. Adding on a Pinlock lens gives you the most fog-free riding experience out there. Shield changes are a breeze thanks to the tool-less RapidFire Shield Replacement System. Replacement shields are available in virtually every color of the transparent or metallic rainbow so you can fight the sun, match your bike or match your mindset. DOT approved. Meets the FMVSS 218 Standard.
feature_bullets: HJC Solid CL-17 Full Face Helmet for Men

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars75 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
